root.Summary: 1: Lee DS, Chen JH, Lundy DJ, Liu CH, Hwang SM, Pabon L, Shieh RC, Chen CC, WuSN, Yan YT, Lee ST, Chiang PM, Chien S, Murry CE, Hsieh PC.
